Nelson Angelo is one of the most creative and revered artists in Brazilâ€™s
contemporary music scene. Particularly famous for his prolific fifteen-
year association with many big Brazilian names, with whose he tourney 
worldwide and recorded legendary albums ,his musicianship goes beyond 
technique and taste into the realm of artistry through intuition. After 
the sounds of Brazil became an integral part of Londonâ€™s dance floor jazz
